DSParallelType

Indicates the parallel mode that the direct solver will use

Synopsis

typedef enum { DS_PARALLEL_REDUNDANT,
               DS_PARALLEL_SYNCHRONIZED,
               DS_PARALLEL_DISTRIBUTED } DSParallelType;

See Also

DSSetParallel()

Level

advanced

Location

include/slepcds.h
